select
from core.event_metadata em join core.event e on em.event_id = e.id where em.document_id = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and em.date_deleted is null

select
distinct
from core.event_metadata em join core.event e on em.event_id = e.id
order by em.${orderByClause}

select
from core.event_metadata em join core.event e on em.event_id = e.id where ( em.openmrs_uuid is null or em.openmrs_uuid ='' ) and em.server_version between #{from,jdbcType=BIGINT} and #{to,jdbcType=BIGINT} and em.date_deleted is null LIMIT #{limit}
select event_id from core.event_metadata em where em.form_submission_id = #{formSubmissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and em.date_deleted is null limit 1
select e.id, e.json from core.event e where e.id = #{eventId} limit 1

with em as ( select event_id from core.event_metadata where provider_id=#{providerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and server_version::BIGINT >= #{serverVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT} )select core.event.id,core.event.json from core.event where id=any(select event_id from em ) order by core.event.json->>'serverVersion' asc
select LPAD(n::text, (case when length(n::text)>=4 then length(n::text) else 4 end), '0') from generate_series(${maxId}, ${maxIdPlus}) as x(n) order by x.n
